A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of the best films I have seen in an age. It takes tired movie tropes and flips them on their heads. I'm not surprised a few narrow-minded folks are throwing their toys out of the pram - it won't serve you the same tired rubbish you're used to seeing\, and that may upset some who want to basically see the same film with the same characters doing the same things over and over again
